review: Better than I expected. Love it
author: S. Jones

review: I'm going with 4 stars for right now. It may jump to 5 over time. The interface is pretty solid and user friendly. I'm mainly using it for Netflix, Amazon and ESPN 3 access on a TV that doesn't have any of that hooked up to it from another device. All those apps work well and deliver great video quality. I am attempting to use Flixster, as well, even though I hold it and it's sister company in contempt. Flixster is the one app I have not liked thus far. Mainly, their video compression and delivery is not near the level of Amazon and Netflix... so why production companies keep using it is beyond me. That's not really a knock on the Fire Stick, though. Would like to see an IMDB app on it, too.
author: M. Ruch

review: I like it.  It's fast and for the most part easy to use.  The layout of the menu and app store are ok. I understand that Amazon wants to prioritize their offerings.  I wish that Vudu was an available app.
author: Deedubcee

review: So far so good wish it had Disney anytime movies.
author: Geoffrey King

review: It works much better than I expected. I am really pleased, but watch what you click on or you can soon have a large bill.
author: Pepe

review: Stick arrived yesterday.  Reception is great and set up and using are,so far, easy.  The only complaintis the length of the power cord is about 18-24 inches and not long enough to reach my outlet.
author: Linda Tuttle

review: I never this much from this device! Very very nice! This is a winner!
author: David Schmidt
